channel.title: Serial 1 on Pwn the world.
channel.description: Recent content in Serial 1 on Pwn the world.

item.title: Serial 1
item.description: Name: serial: 2 Date release: 27 Sep 2019 Author: sk4 Series: serial Initial Discovery VMIP is the VM’s IP Address LHIP is the Local Host’s IP Address IP Discovery Run sudo netdiscover. It detects online hosts by sending ARP requests. Output of netdiscover. 192.168.1.10 happens to be the IP of the VM. Port Discovery Search for any exposed ports on the VM. Run nmap -sC -sV -p- -A 192.
